bug.author: timokau
bug.description:
Coach depends on futures: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/NervanaSystems/coach/blob/30c2b2fc4586d1bf6b50e1b6f2c2a5c04acf2947/requirements.txt#L12>https://github.com/NervanaSystems/coach/blob/30c2b2fc4586d1bf6b50e1b6f2c2a5c04acf2947/requirements.txt#L12</denchmark-link>
But also requires at least python 3.5. The documentation <denchmark-link:https://pypi.org/project/futures/>says</denchmark-link> :
This is a backport of the concurrent.futures standard library module to Python 2. It should not be installed on Python 3, although there should be no harm in doing so, as the standard library takes precedence over third party libraries.
